cards.name: In the Calm Sunlight, Tamayura
cards.effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from 'Nine-tailed Fox Spirit, Tamayura', look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with 'Ririmi' or 'Rarami' in its card name or a Fox Art card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 
[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] which seeks the Fire Regalis)
